name: Brain Guzzler
summary:
Guzzle brains and keep the zombie conga alive! Brain Guzzler is an action packed classic where you take control of the zombie outbreak. Gobble up humans and add them to your Zombie chain, but remember don’t eat yourself, zombies taste bad!

Keen reflexes are your best weapon to avoid obstacles and catch those delicious human morsels. Avoid walls, dodge mines and battle bosses to unlock new towns and chase down more succulent civilians.

Guzzlers simple one touch controls combined with it’s classic “Snake” style mechanic makes it addictive and easy to play. See how many towns you can consume or play survival mode and see just how long you can build up your cannibalistic conga line.
